DOC.detailed_description: Objective : To study impact wearable cardioverter defibrillator ( WCD ) use sudden cardiac death hemodialysis patient . Study Population : Participants patient begin hemodialysis ( < 2 month initiation ) ≥ 50 year old . Intervention : A WCD use protection sudden cardiac death ( SCD ) . Study Design : The study multi-center , prospective , randomize control trial 1:1 assignment treatment control . Study Size : The study enroll 2,600 subject . A maximum 200 site use enrollment .
